description:
No existing antidote can save Luffy from the poison coursing through his veins, yet Bon Clay refuses to give up. His final, fleeting hope is a mysterious miracle-worker rumored to have vanished into the Gates of Hell!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Paradise in Hell! Impel Down Level 5.5!
Jigoku ni Rakuen! Impel Down Level 5.5
Un paradis en Enfer, le cinquième cercle et demi d`Impel Down
Едем посеред пекла. Імпел Даун, рівень 5,5
Рай в аду! Импел Даун – уровень 5.5
فردوس في الجحيم! المستوى 5.5 من إمبل داون!
地獄に楽園 インペルダウンLV5.5
